Summary: saw a ufo, jelly bean shape with a seamless chrome surface
divs: sighting detailsi was driving west down 131st st. toward the the of lamont \ i was nearing the cross roads of 131st and archer ave.(about a mile from the intersection \ up in the western sky about 8 degrees to my right, i would say approx. 2:00 o'clock in the sky, low above tree line \ the object was quite a distance off \ had a jelly bean shape to it with the ends somewhat tapered \it had a chrome color to it \ it did not shine as if on its own \ rather it looked reflective, like the chrome of a car bumper \odd thing about this object is that it did not appear to move \i thought perhaps it may be a plane coming towards me \ seen that in planes were they seem to stand still until they approach \ but this was different \ it had no appearance of any conventional aircraft i have seen \ and then after about a minute as i looking at it on and off while driving, the object suddenly vanished \ no clouds, blus sky, nothing else in the sky except for this chrome looking jelly bean shape object, just hanging in midair, no trails as in jet gas, nothing , then as if a rip in the blue sky it disappeared \ at the blink of an eye it was gone. my wife was with me, she made light of it, while i was amazed at what i saw \ at first i thought it was a silver (chrome) blimp \ the surface was completly smooth, not like a blimp surface \ that is what was starnge to me \ so i kept watching, wondering, wow what a shiny blimp \ but its not moving, after several seconds, puff vanished instantly \ thats it \ as for position in the sky, let me try again, more exact, lets say the horizon line facing west as i was, is 9:00 o'clock, this object was approx. 10:30 \ but if facing west and applied the entire clock face, then as i said before, it would appear to be at 2:00 o'clock \ once it vanished as it did, i could only conclude it was a ufo \ i thought i was lucky to have seen this \ this is my second time to have seen something \ first time was in '67 while looking out a school window \ i made a report with mufon 30 some years later \ some may say 30 years, how could i remember such details \ such an experience will remain forever
